answers.answer: Did they say you couldn't eat anything? I took the test last month & they just told me not to eat or drink anything sweet 12 hours before the test but recommended that I ate something with protein before getting the test done.

They said I could eat normally for mine, just not to eat or drink right before I drank the stuff. I only had to do the one hour test so far. So that day I had lunch about noon, drank the stuff at 2 and had my blood drawn at 3 then could eat normally again after that.
I don't remember rather or not they said that I could eat . I know after my appt , imma eat a BIG JUICY BURGER.

question: I'm Starving & I Haven't Eaten Since Yesterday :( Ughhh! Lord Help Me . I'm Hungry As Hell ! & I Don't Go To The Doctor Until 2:30pm
title: Whose Taken The Gestational Diabetes Test?
